Reinforced polymer chassis, superior ergonomics, ambidextrous controls, proven safety features. The new standard in reliability when your job is to serve and protect and your life is on the line.

In the design of the M&P, we considered the needs of military and law enforcement from every conceivable angle. No other polymer pistol offers this combination of versatility, durability and safety.

 Model: M&P9c

 Professional / Duty
 Recreational

 Apex M&P Polymer Forward Set Sear and Trigger Kit 

 The Apex Polymer Forward Set Sear and Trigger Kit features a solid polymer trigger body, with center pivoting safety. This kit will set the trigger break point farther forward than the factory trigger assembly as well as, significantly reduce the uptake and over travel. It produces a trigger pull very similar to that of a 1911 but in a polymer frame striker-fired pistol. The Polymer Forward Set Sear & Trigger Kit boasts a smooth trigger pull throughout the break. The rounded trigger face provides the user with a comfortable surface for the firing finger. The kit comes with two (2) trigger return springs; one designed to produce approximately a 4.0 lbs trigger pull (silver spring), and one to produce a 5.0 lbs trigger pull (green spring). These two options give the end user the ability to customize their trigger pull for their specific needs.

 Expected Results 
– Reduced trigger pre-travel and over travel to produce a feel similar to a single action fire control system 
– A smooth trigger pull all the way through to the break 
– Center mounted pivoting safety maintains factory safety values 
– 4.0 lbs (silver spring) or 5.0 lbs (green spring) trigger pull weight, depending on which trigger return spring is installed

 Apex Trigger:
 Features & Specifications 
– Lowers trigger weight to approximately 4.0 lbs (silver spring) and 5.0 lbs (green spring)
– Smooth uptake and reset 
– Center mounted pivoting safety maintains factory safety values 
– Works with all Smith & Wesson M&P pistols in centerfire calibers (excluding the Shield) 
– Easy to install 
– Requires use of sear housing block designed for large size sear plunger and spring

The extended range of the Seek XR sees objects twice as far away with the same clarity and resolution as the original Seek camera, and can focus on objects as near as 8 inches for precise, close-up macro imaging. The Seek XR allows you to literally see heat, making it possible to spot people and animals in daylight, total darkness, or in obscured visibility conditions. This true thermal imaging camera uses the data from over 32,000 thermal pixels to create a visible image on your smartphone. Imagine having 15rds of 2.75" shell or 25Mini shells!!




The KSG (Kel-Tec Shotgun) is Kel-Tec CNC’s first entry into the shotgun market. The size, shape, and design is similar to the currently available Kel-Tec RFB rifle, but the KSG ejects downward, instead of forward, HERA arms OD Green Front Grip. The KSG weighs 6.9 lbs. and is as compact as legally possible with a 26.1” overall length and an 18.5” cylinder bore barrel. Even with this compact size, the internal dual tube magazines hold an impressive 12 rounds of 12 gauge 3” rounds in total (6 per tube). It can also reliably shoot shells as short as 1 3/4" up to the 3".

This simple and reliable pump action feeds from either the left or right tube. The feed side is manually selected by a lever located behind the trigger guard.

title: For Sale:  RARE Kimber Ultra Elite 3" Super Carry 1911 .45ACP
postcontent:
The Kimber Ultra Elite 3" 1911 is the ultimate carry solution.  These hard to find, high end 1911 have features found on pistols costing thousands of dollar more.

Includes everything from the factory including 3 magazines, 2x stainless steel and 1x matte black.  Original factory grips are included but black satin ALUMAGRIPS are installed. In like new condition with less than 50 rounds fired and meticulously maintained.

Custom Shop features include meltdown treatment for rounded and blended edges, KimPro™ premium finish on frame, Tritium three dot night sights, ambidextrous thumb safety, hand-checkered double diamond rosewood grips, Premium Aluminum Trigger and special Custom Shop markings and serial number.

The Ultra Elite has a three inch spherical cone match grade bushingless bull barrel design with a dual-captured low-effort recoil spring system. Working together, the twin recoil springs soften recoil and ensure flawless function. At the same time, manual slide operation is comparable to a full size 1911. Also unique to the Ultra Elite is a special beveling treatment at both the front and rear of the ejection port that prevents ejection jams common to other small 1911-type pistols.

As with all Kimber pistols with lightweight aluminum frames, the Ultra Elite frame is cut from a solid aluminum brick and machined to the same precision tolerances as our steel frames. We use only 7075-T7 aluminum, the finest and strongest available. The slide is machined from a solid stainless steel forging. Even the front strap checkering on these pistols is a special pattern. By using 30 lines per inch on the horizontal axis and 20 lines per inch on the vertical, it grips the hand firmly yet doesn’t break skin like standard patterns that form sharper points.

The Ultra Elite weighs just 25 ounces. Magazine capacity is six rounds

Meltdown treatment-all corners rounded Tritium night sights KimPro finish Checkered front strap (30 LPI horizontal & 20 LPI vertical) Premium aluminum trigger Ambidextrous thumb safety Hand checkered double diamond rosewood grips Special markings & serial number 

Each pistol incorporates standard Kimber features including match grade barrel and chamber, beveled magazine well, tactical ejector, high ride beavertail grip safety, match grade trigger group and beveled slide serrations. 

Equaled only by custom pistols costing thousands more, the Kimber Special Editions are the finest production concealed carry 1911’s ever manufactured. 

With a three inch spherical cone bull barrel, meltdown treatment and lightweight aluminum frame machined from solid bar stock, this 25 ounce powerhouse is the ideal carry or backup gun. Kimber’s unique design has special beveling at front and rear of the ejection port to prevent jams common to other small 1911’s. The KimPro finish, the hardest thermally cured finish available, gives the frame extra protection. The Ultra Elite is reliable with a variety of ammunition, including premium defense loads. 

Special Custom Shop features include everything listed plus: 

KimPro finish on frame Stainless small parts on frame Satin stainless steel slide 

Ultra Elite Barrel Length (in.) 3 Finish - Slide: Satin Frame: Kim Pro (black) Sights: Tritium Three Dot Sight Radius (in.) 4.8 Appx. Weight (oz) 25 Overall Length (in.) 6.8 Mag Capacity: 6 Grips Hand Checkered double diamond rosewood

title: For Sale:  .50 BMG Brass (84 Pieces)
postcontent:
I did a pretty quick count of the brass 84 pieces, should be within + or - two pieces
I had a decent amount of the stuff that I received in a trade, I picked the best looking ones out then I sonic cleaned them twice. Then tumbled them in walnut media for several hours, looks good as new. 

Some of the cases have rough looking primers, but should still be able to be de-primed. Handful of them have already been sized, de-primed, trimmed, and deburred. I did not do this work, I do not reload .50 BMG. 

70% headstamps are LC (Lake City)
30% headstamps are PMJ (South Korean contract) Did some research on the PMJ  headstamps and it seems that it's among the best .50 BMG brass out there. 

$50 may ship depending on your location.

".223 Wylde is a hybrid .223/5.56 chamber designed by Bill Wylde to yield the accuracy advantages of the match .223 Remington commercial chambering but without pressure or reliability failures when using high velocity 5.56 NATO spec ammunition. postcontent: New unfired direct from the factory Israel Weapons Industry Tavor SAR in the very hard to find OD Green. This rifle is chambered in 5.56 nato. These are amazing rifles. Comes in factory box with one magazine and factory paper work. From the factory: The TAVOR® is a perfect fusion of an ordnance grade steel receiver coupled to a Mil-Spec cold hammer forged barrel and encased into a high-impact strength polymer uni-body with exceptional situational ergonomics. The ultra-compact form factor allows for easy transitions in close quarter situations…or even in your favorite deer blind. The bullpup design moves the center of gravity of the rifle closer to the users’ body allowing for more instinctive aiming and improved acquisition time to target. This innovative design also allows for a full length barrel, which means no loss of down range ballistic accuracy. Near and far range accuracy is enhanced by the minimized recoil provided by a non-lubricated long stroke gas piston system. With the exception of a hand-specific locking bolt, the rifle is completely ambidextrous allowing for easy left-hand conversion of the operating handle, ejection port, fire-control safety, sling swivel receptacles and fore-mounted accessory Picatinny rail. The TAVOR® is supplied with IDF-tested and approved magazines – but you can also use your own AR-15/M16 style magazines.

title: For Sale:  Mossberg 12 gauge model 500 All Purpose Blue & Synthetic 3 inch 28 inch .715 IC / Modified Vent Rib Recoil Pad Excellent Condition Factory Demo 500fixed28
postcontent: Seller Stock #: LG500Fixed28VR Photo specimen is representative from a handful of virtually identical shotguns, all of them are within 5 percentage points on their finish grade, excellent condition. We can furnish photos of any exact specimen upon request. Dealers, law enforcement, and collectors may take any number of virtually identical shotguns we have on hand at the same per-gun price and with no extra shipping charges. The Mossberg model 500 has never been as prestigious as the arch-competitor Remington 870, but it’s just as tried, and just as true. Here is a very attractive specimen of Mossberg’s All Purpose 12 gauge 500 series. Manufacturer, of course, is O.F. Mossberg & Sons of New Haven, CT. Model is 500 All Purpose. Type is pump or slide action shotgun. Construction is steel barrel and working parts all built into an alloy receiver that undercuts the 870 on weight, with weather resistant, recoil absorbing black synthetic stock and forend. Finish is blue steel barrel, black anodized receiver, and chrome plated bolt and shell carrier. Trigger group housing is high impact black polymer, with .292 smooth faced trigger. Safety is top tang type. Barrel is 3 inch chambered blued steel 28 inch Ventilated Rib. The Barrel is marked Modified, probably under the influence of waterfowl pressure. Muzzle diameter, however, is actually a .715 vicinity Improved Cylinder, steel, slug, and buckshot permissible. This is a fixed choke barrel, it will not accept choke tubes. Sight system is 12 post serrated top Ventilated Rib with brass center bead and ivory colored front bead sight. Magazine capacity is 5 rounds of 2 3/4 inch shells, or 4 rounds of 3 inch shells, and the distinctive Mossberg adapter plug is included to bring a hunter in compliance with 2+1 shot regulations. Weight empty is 7 1/2 pounds, with center of gravity about 1 inch forward of the receiver. Buttstock measures 13 7/8 inches from the trigger face to the end of the 7/8 inch black rubber factory recoil pad. Stock drop is 1 1/2 inches at the comb, and 2 1/2 inches at the butt, with a right hand cant of about 3/4 inch. This model 500 comes to us from Mossberg’s distribution system. It is what we call a factory demo, probably a sales rep’s sample or a showgirl at a Firearms Industry trade show. Surface detractions are negligible to minimal on this shotgun, as its photos show. We rate it as Excellent, perhaps Near Mint, but photos ought to suffice for our distinguished shoppers to judge finish grade for themselves. Often a person can spot the letter U stamped on the left side of the receiver above the serial number. Bore, chamber, and mechanism are all bright and clean. This model 500 comes in a relabeled Mossberg Factory Box with factory lock, instruction manual, NSSF and NRA flyers. If this shotgun was test fired, it was fewer than 20 times. Replacement pricing on mossberg com is upwards of $400 on this shotgun. We’re offering the Mossberg 500 in the photos, however, or one of its virtually identical mates, for only $ 199.00.  Shipping. $20 flat fee lower 48 states; $60 Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico, UPS Ground or USPS Priority with full insurance coverage. Don’t let your buddies use your account, that kind of thing smells like felony level straw purchase attempt. NO AMEX NO PAYPAL. We accept MC/Visa/Discover/USPS MO paid orders shipped ASAP. 7 day hold on checks. FFL ok by fax, e-mail or mail, please ask your dealer to put your name and Gun Brand on there. 7 day money back on used, no return on New Items, layaway, or ammo. We do not pay transfer fees or return shipping. Lay-away 20% down, balance in 90 days. Phone hours 8:00 – 5:00 CST Mon - Fri CST. Local pickup OK. Robertson Trading Post 117 Front Street PO Box 365 Henderson, Tennessee 38340 We Buy, Sell, or Trade. We always have, since 1952.

"JUST TO GIVE YOU AN IDEA OF SELLING PRICE" one of these, that had a higher quantity produced, "1500 units" with slick rosewood combats, "not the exquisite Altamont Rosewood Stocks" that you see on mine, sold on March 25th on Gunbroker for $1599.00.
